ygData.subject: Download HTML/JSP/PHP pages and linked pages (same domain)
ygData.msgSnippet: I searched this forum for my requirement where I would like to download HTML or JSP or PHP pages but couldn t find a complete answer. DOWNLOAD THE HTML/JSP/PHP

I searched this forum for my requirement where I would like to 
download HT=
ML or JSP or PHP pages but couldn't find a complete 
answer. 

DOWNLOAD THE=
 HTML/JSP/PHP page with linked pages in the same domain. 
I do not want CSS=
 or images or pdf or other files. Also, when the 
pages are fetched would i=
t be possible to separate them by page?

For eg. www.mydomain.com/index.htm=
 has a link catchme.htm in the same 
domain, I would like to download both =
index and catchme.htm but if 
catchme.hm exists in a different domain www.d=
omainme.com then I do 
not want catchme.htm. I have following configuration=
 in global.sheet 
and don't seem to get the expected result.

Separate Page=
s: First would be index.htm and the second page would be 
catchme.htm. 

Wi=
th the below configuration it fetches all the files that includes 
images, =
pdf, wav etc.,

I'm using 2.0.0

Any help would be appreciated.
